All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Bullet
A bullet that can be shot by a BulletShooter
BulletShooter
A Bullet spawner for a Character
BulletTimer
A Timer that despawns the Bullet after a certain amount of time
Button
Basic class for creating a button to add to a screen
Character
Simple class to create moving characters on a scene with collision and border watching
Door
A simple Door sprite with collision
EndGameScreen
The end screen of the game showing the leaderboard with highscores and the points of the user
Enemy
The super class of an enemy that extends the Character class
EnemyHealthText
A sprite to display health of a Enemy
EnemyTimer
A Timer for handling Enemy behaviour on the game screen
Fireball
An Enemy that moves horizontally and shoots Bullets in a circle like manner
FireballSprite
The sprite of a Fireball
GameScreen
Scene where the game takes place and handles placing entities
HealthDisplay
A class to display the current health and maximum health of a Player
HealthItem
An Item that restores one health to the Player
HeartSprite
A simple sprite of a full heart and an empty heart
IntermissionScreen
The Screen for between levels to give Player a short breath between levels and show the bonus points for the Player
InvulnerabilityTimer
A Timer to give the Player invulnerability so he could get out of harms way.
Item
A basic item that an Enemy can drop for the Player
ItemDropper
Handles dropping items if the enemy is killed and has not already dropped an item
ItemTimer
A Timer for Items to clean them up from the scene
KeyItem
An Item that gives the Player the ability to go to the next level
Lock
Creates a simple lock sprite to show if user can go through the door
LockUpdater
A updater for Lock that checks on a certain interval
Main
The main entry point of the game and initializes the screen width and height plus sets up the scenes that will be used
MaxHealthItem
An Item that adds one max health to the Player
NameTextEntity
A text entity on the scene to display the typed name of the user
NameTextUpdater
A updater for NameTextEntity that checks on a certain interval
NewGameButton
A Button to start a new game
NextLevelButton
A Button to send user to the next level
Obstacle
A basic class for creating an obstacle
Player
A playable character listens to mouse movements and pressed keys
Rock
A rock Obstacle
SceneChangeButton
A Button to change the scene
ScoreTextEntity
A simple entity to display the score of the Player
ScoreTextUpdater
A updater for ScoreTextEntity that checks on a certain interval
SimpleSprite
A simple way to create a sprite to use in a scene
TitleScreen
TitleScreen of the game with hints about the items, player and enemies
Toxic
A Toxicgas Obstacle that does damage to the Player
WeaponItem
An Item that upgrades the weapon of the Player
Zombie
An Enemy that chases the Player to kill him
ZombieSprite
The sprite of the Zombie
